title: Should I invest in blockchain technology and cryptocurrency? - Quora

response.answer_text: Investing in blockchain technology is an individual choice. However, its a good thing bit one really need to tread carefully. Start with projects that has potentials to succeed in the market on a long run. Projects like bitcoin, ethereum, Litecoin, Monero, Veil and Harmony. Not a financial advice though but you can do further research on these projects.

Yes please.. Blockchain technology is taking over in every sector so you should embrace it. Also cryptocurrencies can bring you mass profit over time depending on the coins/tokens you chose to buy. Buying tokens like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Veil, Litecoin and a few others will make you happy that you invested in cryptocurrency.
